Uses of Package
com.alvermont.terraj.util.ui

Packages that use com.alvermont.terraj.util.ui
com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.ui Contains code that handles the Swing user interface for the fractal planetary terrain generator. 
com.alvermont.terraj.planet.ui Contains the Swing user interface for the planetary terrain generator. 
com.alvermont.terraj.util.ui Contains Swing related utility code that is shared among all the applications. 
 

Classes in com.alvermont.terraj.util.ui used by com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.ui
HiddenTableModel
          A table model that can show or hide selected columns of the data.

          Attempt to encapsulate a file chooser (which doesn't work in JNLP) and hide the fact that we're not running as a normal app.

LookAndFeelWatcher
